synopsis.text: Romeo's masked persona as a professional wrestler and his role as a caring CEO of a struggling orphanage define his double life in Kick-Heart. Meanwhile, Juliet, a gentle nun working at the same orphanage, hides her true identity as a fierce female wrestler. As they cross paths in the wrestling ring, their electrifying chemistry becomes undeniable. Romeo finds solace in the pain he endures during matches, while Juliet thrives on the adrenaline of inflicting it on her opponents. Amidst the vibrant world of professional wrestling, can Juliet and Romeo reveal their true selves and embrace their love for one another? Or will their secrets keep them forever apart?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
